channel.title: Plex on Deuts Log
channel.description: Recent content in Plex on Deuts Log

item.title: Streaming Movies and TV Shows on Kodi
item.description: You can set up Kodi to stream media from a VPS or local server using Apache or Nginx. See the video for details on adding remote media sources in Kodi.

item.title: Can This Old Laptop Handle Plex?
item.description: A 7th-gen i5 laptop should easily handle Plex, even for 4K streams. A low-spec Beelink S1 Mini PC (Celeron N3450) runs Plex and several Docker services without issue.
